channel.title: envelope on elektrophon
channel.description: Recent content in envelope on elektrophon

item.title: kontur
item.description: Construction The AD/AR contains two envelope circuits and one pulse timer. Both will have a trigger at the end of the envelope or delayed pulse. The end of envelope is not connected to another input, those must be patched. The output of the delayed pulse is connected to the input of the first envelope. 2021-12-23T12:16:09.231437 image/svg+xml Matplotlib v3.5.1, https://matplotlib.org/ *{stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: butt} 2021-12-23T12:16:09.
